info.name: OK Cupid 2018 - Dark Updated
info.description:
I got tired of the other one not being updated with the big blue bar at the top. I used his code as a base, and expanded upon it. I hope he found a date and stopped using the site!

I'm a freelance graphic and web designer, currently single, and so I'd rather visit OKC at a coffee shop without all the bright colors advertising "I AM SINGLE AND LOOKING". lol
info.additionalInfo:
Wed. Jan 24, 2018: OKC updated a few things, and so I countered with updating this. Let me know if anything else is found to be ugly.

I just went through the site one by one changing all the crazy colors. I might be missing something since I learned how to make a style and made it within like an hour while wired with coffee. Feel free to make your own using this as a base or somehow contact me and I'll change whatever. lol
